Message:
The disease came to
the village soon after that...
And people died one by one—

left out to rot because everyone
else was scared of catching
the disease.

Dad refused to let me help
as he began burying
the abandoned bodies.
One by one, all by himself...

In the end,
Dad died to the same disease.

And when I was burying Dad,
I finally realized...

that humans really are
useless in the face of death.
